scripts.build: npm i ../../ && (rm -rf ../../build/vite-react-ts-swc || true) && tsc && vite build && mv dist ../../build/vite-react-ts-swc
scripts.safetest:ci:test: OPT_URL=https://safetest-two.vercel.app/vite-react-ts-swc OPT_CI=1 OPT_DOCKER=1 OPT_ARTIFACTS=artifacts.json npm run safetest -- --run --bail=5
scripts.process:ci: npx safetest merge-json results.json artifacts.json && cp results.json ../../build/vite-react-ts-swc/results.json
